short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An easy to use and useful Dashboard for Google Chrome

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple and elegant dashboard by the team behind SmallURL.
View your Bookmarks, Installed Extensions and Take notes all in your new tab page.

v0.4 Changes
 - Misc Bug Fixes
 - Pretty Bookmarks Page
 - Coloured notes
 - Interchangeable backgrounds
 - Clear ALL Notes Button (Backspace works too!)

v0.5 (Unreleased Changes)
 - Updated FontAwesome URL to match a change.

v0.6 Changes
 - Bundled FontAwesome with the Dashboard

v1.0 Changes
 - Renamed from SmallURL Dashboard to Ilkotech Dashboard
 - Sun/Moon icon correctly reflects time of day
 - Background is no longer selectable. Uses a custom Flickr API
 - Background changes each part of the day every day.
 - Icons/Buttons rearranged
 - Settings menu has a new look
 - Pressing backspace nolonger deletes a note.
 - All notes are partially transparent with a nice blur.
